name: GUIB SG
short_description:
GUIB SG is a bitcoin miner with a GUI!

It use .net framework and I have wrote 2 different code one that use as engine .net framework 4.0 and a other that use .net framework 2.0

so the system requirements are:
Internet connection (check :-))
Windows 95 or higher (check)
 
so it run"s on each computer i have not tested wine so I'm sorry Linux users.
summary: GUIB SG is a bitcoin miner with a GUI!
